code: public static <T> T doPrivilegedIOException(PrivilegedExceptionAction<T> operation) throws IOException {     SpecialPermission.check().     try {         return AccessController.doPrivileged(operation).     } catch (PrivilegedActionException e) {         throw (IOException) e.getCause().     } }

public static void doPrivilegedVoidIOException(CheckedRunnable<IOException> action) throws IOException {     SpecialPermission.check().     try {         AccessController.doPrivileged((PrivilegedExceptionAction<Void>) () -> {             action.run().             return null.         }).     } catch (PrivilegedActionException e) {         throw (IOException) e.getCause().     } }
